text: 4.9 2 Kin 17.24, Esr 4.1-5, 9.1–10.44, Neh 4.1-2, Luk 9.52-53, Apo 10.28 Agek bin anɨb ak agak, Nad bɨ Juda olap, yad bin Samaliya ak pen, taynen yɨp ñɨg mal ñe ñɨŋin agɨl ageban agak? Bin ak ne nɨgak, Juda binɨb okok, kɨli Samaliya binɨb nɨŋɨd asɨk tep gɨpal anɨb ak tek, ne takaw anɨb ak Jisas nop agak.
